title: The Spinning Wheels Edition
description:
Felix Salmon of Fusion, emerging-markets expert Anna Szymanski, and Slate Moneybox columnist Jordan Weissmann discuss: -       The auto industry as an indicator of a slowing economy

-       Artificial intelligence as the next big innovation

-       Apple’s new headquarters

Check out other Panoply podcasts at megaphone.fm. Email: slatemoney@slate.comTwitter: @felixsalmon,@Three_Guineas, @JHWeissmann Production by Daniel Schroeder. --Felix Salmon is a senior editor at Fusion.--Anna Szymanski is an emerging markets expert and senior strategy officer at a political risk startup.--Jordan Weissmann is Slate’s senior business and economics correspondent.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
